channel.title: Lolol... Jagex system getting fucked up
channel.description:
I just got a message from Jagex, In the Hotmail it says for Macoring, When I went to Appeal offence and ban, Its saying that It is a mute... and the date is 27/8/2010.. WTF... See yourself
[url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/e876d5c8ff.png][/img][/url]
[url=http://www.freeimagehosting.net/][img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/uploads/34134237d7.png[/img][/url]

item.title: Lolol... Jagex system getting fucked up
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

P E:

I’ve clicked one of these links before :o I noticed that i did not have the green bar thing at the top so i left it

Green bar depends on browser. Just read the link
on /b/ I saw 2 phishing sites yesteday, they where like "www.servics.runesape.com

Read full topic

item.title: Lolol... Jagex system getting fucked up
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Cole1497, post:46, topic:392831”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=490001.msg3584715#msg3584715 date=1304076448]

Actually i didn’t change anything… Just made a mistake -.-

Annnndddddd, then you changed it.
[/quote]
you should see the PM he sent me, talking about “our herping England is so much better than your derping America because the largest meal u guise can order is the smallest for us, yet ur still fat. btw FUCK U FUCK U you rep-- me, rep abuse lolol im just bored” and things like this.[/quote]
Lol, I don’t think the new people will ever realize that to be respected they have to respect us as a community, aka round is probably not going to be in our little circle now.

Read full topic
item.source: Lolol... Jagex system getting fucked up

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“round, post:42, topic:392831”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=490001.msg3584698#msg3584698 date=1304075035]

Ha… nice… you know how to call people retards over a computer screen… well done.

no1 knows who are, don’t come out of nowhere and disrespect the respected
[/quote]Ah, so he’s allowed to call us retards but I cannot say that he’s just said that over a computer screen? Okay… I get it now. Sorry for being such a prick… yeah i’m very sorry… didn’t mean to… no… didn’t, really…[/quote]
I like how you changed your comment after you learned I was referring to both you and usama299 as retards. Ahh, this community gives me little giggles everyday.
